references: M. Abramowitz and I. A. Stegun, eds., Handbook of Mathematical Functions, National Bureau of Standards Applied Math. Series 55, 1964 (and various reprintings), p. 2.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=0,...,100
M. Abramowitz and I. A. Stegun, eds., Handbook of Mathematical Functions, National Bureau of Standards, Applied Math. Series 55, Tenth Printing, 1972 [alternative scanned copy].
prog: (PARI) for(n=0,23,print(floor(exp(1)^(n*Pi))))(PARI) { default(realprecision, 200); e=exp(1); for (n=0, 100, write("b062360.txt", n, " ", floor(e^(n*Pi))) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 06 2009]
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jul 06 2001
